answers.answer: Had them too. They gave me meds to stop the contractions.   But the side effects of the meds are horrible.
I'm due the same day as you, I have been getting constant pains since around 30 weeks, also I think I lost my mucus plug today. Luckily I have a midwife app tmmrw
And I had to get the mess to stop contractions with my first, so I'm all worried I'll have to get them again

Well good luck ladies, unfortunately I'm all to get formular with this, with my last son, who's now 7, I went into labor at about 26wks and they gave me this cocktail then, I developed gestational diabetes which went away immediately after he was born at 31wks (I was on bed rest the entire time in between and miserable). So at my age with this one,  I'm just blessed to make it this far complication free til last night,  and they're just really trying to get him to stay in just 2 more weeks. But I'm prepared either way

I'm due march 13 and am dilated to almost a 4 already. But cervix is still high. I am on pills for contractions now and have been on weekly appts since I started dilating. Hoping I make it. I still have contractions. And can't really just rest cause I have a 2 year old. Lol
And my mucus plug came out. But that can happen anytime in pregnancy and is normal. It grows back.

question: Well guys, I started having horrible back pain around 1:30 today while at work, around 3:30 it got unbearable to the point my boss called my husband to come get me and take me to the hospital. I'M 0cm, but 80% effaced, contractions were coming every 2 to 7 mins.  They gave me some things to stop contractions ands are going to give me the steroid to develop baby's lungs. I'll be 34wks tomorrow, due date 3/17. Anyone else having early contractions
title: My little peanut may come early
